articles.title: COVID-19 vaccine two-third ready, claims Israeli scientist - THE WEEK
articles.description: The scientist said that the vaccine could still take over a year to develop

articles.title: CSIRO unlocks new way to understand evolving strains of SARS-CoV-2 - EurekAlert
articles.description:
Researchers from CSIRO, Australia's national science agency, have unveiled a new approach to analysing the genetic codes -- or the blueprint -- of the SARS-CoV-2 virus that causes COVID-19. 
The findings will help researchers better understand how strains of…
articles.content:
IMAGE: CSIRO researchers are studying SARS-CoV-2, which has a single-stranded RNA genome, to understand how the virus evolves.

Credit: CSIRO
